heading: D4 Planner & Database Update for S5 PTR
content: We are happy to announce that our and Diablo 4 have been updated for the S5 PTR! This includes the shiny new and reworked from the PTR. You can now theorycraft builds using data from the Season 5 PTR. To switch between the Live and PTR data use the toggle at the top. This way you can continue to progress your current Season 4 character while experimenting with new things. Our planner is up to date with the S5 PTR, but the guide updates need more time. Stay tuned for future updates on that front. Diablo 4 Season 5 brings several new build defining and build enhancing . In addition, the new enable new playstyles. Finally, were reworked into giving them a better sense of identity and a shiny new purple color. is blasting the S5 PTR to test the update. Therefore, our guides are updated for Season 5 yet! Stay tuned for future announcements to find out when they're ready. With that said, head over to our and select the to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 4&5 experience! Written by: Reviewed by:
